resources.string: The app that turns everyday tasks into an adventure
That\'s awesome that you identify as something else (perhaps a tri-gender pyro fox?) but this game only has settings for boys and girls :(
Let\'s start by adding our first task. Click the plus button to the right!
Excellent! Here you can add activities you want to work on (Read, Run, Etc.) and then press the button below to save them.
Completing tasks will grant gold and experience. Build up enough experience and you\'ll grow levels and unlock new features.
Now you\'re ready to begin your adventure towards a more productive life! Swipe to explore more LifeUp fun
Welcome to the Battlefield. Here you can fight different enemies on your adventure and gain rare loot! Click on the enemies as they pop up to attack before they fight back!
